page.title: 10Dibden Manor.
page.content: In our area there are few residential buildings,only three houses and one hotel.We found farms called Lock's Farm,Manor Farm and Great Copse Farm. The{farmland}was used as both cultivated fields and pasture land. There was some mixed woodland. A{Drainage Network}covered part of the area .The ditches were used to drain{Reclaimed Land}further north. Most of the reclaimed land was mud taken from the River Test. There was only one Post Office in the area.We saw a{golf course}with a pub next to it;one of the two pubs in the survey area.
